title: Chelsea Feil Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Chelsea Feil? Check out all of Chelsea Feil's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogChelsea Feil Marketing Intelligence Specialist Chelsea Feil Chelsea Feil is content marketing manager working on market research at Similarweb. She is a passionate storyteller who loves to find online trends based on data to help readers build strategies and find out where they stand online. She graduated from the State University of New York with a B.A in Media and Communications. When Chelsea is not catching the sunset from the Similarweb Tel Aviv office, you can find her at the beach, playing frisbee with friends, doing yoga, and exploring new destinations, and cultures whenever possible.
